name: Scored & Shield, The Game
description:
This is JoCat's "Scored & Shield" Rhythm Heaven animation turned into a playable rhythm game!

View the original animation by JoCat here:

Game Controls

  • Action: left click
  • Pause: spacebar

I recommend playing on a computer if it's at all possible.  The game technically works on mobile (minus pausing), but you'll likely need -100 to -200 ms of offset for it to feel right, and even then it'll sound wonky unless you mute hitsounds completely.

Credit to osu! for the hitsounds and score sprites.

And again, credit to JoCat for the animation.
